Acta Astronautica Notebooks
==========================

Uranus Orbiter and Probe
-------------------------

Jupyter Notebooks associated with Girija et al. (2022), A Flagship-class Uranus Orbiter and Probe Mission Concept using Aerocapture, submitted to Acta Astronautica.

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1

    /acta-aa-notebooks/uranus-orbiter-probe/01-literature-survey.ipynb
    /acta-aa-notebooks/uranus-orbiter-probe/02-mission-requirements.ipynb
    /acta-aa-notebooks/uranus-orbiter-probe/03-tradespace-exploration.ipynb
    /acta-aa-notebooks/uranus-orbiter-probe/04-approach-trajectory-and-entry-state.ipynb
    /acta-aa-notebooks/uranus-orbiter-probe/05-aerocapture-entry-corridor-and-limiting trajectories.ipynb
    /acta-aa-notebooks/uranus-orbiter-probe/06-effect-of-mean-density-variations.ipynb
    /acta-aa-notebooks/uranus-orbiter-probe/07-guidance-scheme.ipynb
    /acta-aa-notebooks/uranus-orbiter-probe/08-performance-analysis.ipynb
    /acta-aa-notebooks/uranus-orbiter-probe/09-probe-delivery.ipynb
    /acta-aa-notebooks/uranus-orbiter-probe/10-flight-system.ipynb
